a86-1.notes: d049 compliance WORSENING. s1143 (first E session since A#86) shows another d049 violation (0 intel entries). Now 2 violations in last 6 E sessions (s1133, s1143) = 33% violation rate. Was 20% at A#86 (1/5). Per decision tree, 1-2 violations is minor — but trend is negative. wq-367 tracks this. If next E session also violates, will escalate to pattern issue (3+ violations).

a86-2.resolution: Brainstorming idea 'Engagement trace archiving hook' retired in B#326 (visible in BRAINSTORMING.md line 35). Dedup by session number implemented, 500-entry cap deemed unnecessary at current growth rate.

d049_compliance.note: d049 compliance dropped from 80% (A#86) to 67%. Two consecutive-ish violations (s1133, s1143). Not yet at 3+ threshold for pattern issue escalation, but trend is concerning. wq-367 continues tracking.
